response.overview: Originally screened in the winter of 2022/23 in live venues; Infinite Falling Ground (Part 1) was an audiovisual live show conceived to accompany their album of the same title, and themed around the exploration of arguments and entropy.  Directed by Lake Hills and composed entirely 'in-camera' - the resulting work is a blend of dystopian indie film making, experimental abstractions, and dance-focused performance art - set to a soundtrack of original compositions by electronic production duo Ivy Lab.  Our story follows the lives of Charlie & Emma in their doomed romance riddled with dysfunction.... The story continues this Autumn with the release of sequel...
response.title: Infinite Falling Ground (Part One)
